messages.title: Only the Lib Dems will CLEAN UP POLITICS
messages.content: Give you the power to sack corrupt MPs. Stop MPs being bought by millionaire party donors. Make politicians work for the people.

messages.title: We need a change
messages.content: When the Lib Dems put forward plans to clean up Westminster, Labour and the Conservative MPs voted them down.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Britain, the Conservatives can't win. In these areas, it’s a two-horse race between the Lib Dems or Labour. Voting Conservative will just help Labour win. Only the Liberal Democrats can beat Labour.

issues.governance: CLEAN UP POLITICS - Give you the power to sack corrupt MPs. Stop MPs being bought by millionaire party donors. Make politicians work for the people.

quotes.text: Labour MPs charged with false accounting try to claim immunity
An era defined by scandal and sleaze
Three Labour MPs and one Tory peer will face criminal charges over their expenses
Little has changed since the scandals of the Nineties
Cabinet ministers have made tens of thousands 'flipping' their homes
